content: you will have noticed i have not recommended yarn or hook size for wash cloths i recommend cotton/linen/bamboo or some variation of natural plant fibres for hooks i say if your yarn says 4mm try a 5 5mm or 6mm if it says 5mm try a 6 5mm or a 7mm tunisian crochet is *a lot* bulkier than standard crochet and while you want texture i don t think you want cardboard unless you do while this pattern is listed for free if you have enjoyed this or the series of live tutorials run on youtube please consider shouting me a coffee i love coffee a lot https //www buymeacoffee com/chantellehills 1 you can find the playlist of live streamed tutorials here 2 1 https //www buymeacoffee com/chantellehills 2 https //www youtube com/playlist list=pl3sbd5lp0g5l-ifgdmjh_fsncnj2auxzs
